techmeme.title: Sources: Apple plans an AI search tool, World Knowledge Answers, for a spring 2026 Siri revamp; Apple and Google have agreed to test a Google AI model for Siri (Mark Gurman/Bloomberg)
Sources: Mistral AI is finalizing a €2B investment that values the company at €12B, in its first fundraise since June 2024, when it was valued at €5.8B (Kate Clark/Bloomberg)
Source: OpenAI is increasing the size of its secondary share sale to $10.3B, up from $6B; the transaction is at a $500B valuation, in line with expectations (CNBC)
Sources: xAI CFO Mike Liberatore left the startup around the end of July, after joining in April; xAI has seen several high-profile departures in recent weeks (Wall Street Journal)
Google rolls out new Android and Pixel features: Material 3 Expressive design for Pixel 6 and newer models, on-wrist navigation for the Pixel Watch, and more (Aisha Malik/TechCrunch)
